Title: Dropbear: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Dropbear, the worst of
    which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: Dropbear is an SSH server and client designed with a small memory footprint.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Dropbear. Please review the CVE identifier and Gentoo bug referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to trigger a use-after-free condition, possibly resulting in arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition. Additionally, the bundled version of libtommath has an error in its prime number generation, which could result in the generation of weak keys.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Dropbear users should upgrade to the latest version:
